interactionExamples.description: A group discussion at a team meeting
interactionExamples.response: The magician archetype uses their charm and charisma to persuade the group to see their point of view

interactionExamples.description: A conversation with a close friend
interactionExamples.response: The magician archetype is a good listener and provides insightful advice to their friend, helping them to see things in a different light

interactionExamples.description: A presentation to a potential client
interactionExamples.response: The magician archetype uses their natural charisma and charm to win over the client and convince them to choose their product or service

interactionExamples.description: A conversation with a colleague from a different cultural background
interactionExamples.response: The magician archetype uses their understanding of different cultures and their ability to adapt to different situations to effectively communicate and bridge any misunderstandings or communication barriers

interactionExamples.description: An online training session with a remote team
interactionExamples.response: The magician archetype uses their skills in adapting to different situations and their ability to effectively communicate to navigate the challenges of virtual communication and technical difficulties in the training session
